conbody.p: A notification message is sent to the destination and the server does not check whether the notification has been delivered.

A retry mechanism is used if there is an error while sending notification from the notification service. For the retry mechanism, the following parameters must be provisioned in the application preferences.

li.p: Non-Managed Delivery Retry Count: It defines the maximum number of retries allowed for one notification.
Non-Managed Delivery Retry Frequency (secs): It defines the interval between two retries.

note.p: For more information on application preferences, see .
